sourcesContent:
export const NEWS_DATA = [
    { year: 1947, title: "India Achieves Independence", summary: "On August 15, India gained independence; Madras Premier O.P. Ramaswamy Reddiyar hoisted the national flag at Fort St. George.", source_name: "Historical Archives", rank: 1 },
    { year: 1947, title: "Madras Temple Entry Act", summary: "Passed to legally allow all Hindu classes, including Dalits, into temples.", source_name: "Legislative Records", rank: 2 },
    { year: 1947, title: "Devadasi Dedication Abolition", summary: "Outlawing of dedicating girls to Hindu temples as Devadasis.", source_name: "Legislative Records", rank: 3 },
    { year: 1947, title: "MGR Debut Film 'Rajakumari'", summary: "MGR made his hero debut.", source_name: "Film Archives", rank: 4 },
  
    { year: 1948, title: "Madras Public Libraries Act", summary: "Established public library system; Connemara as Central Library.", source_name: "Legislative Records", rank: 1 },
    { year: 1948, title: "First Government Airplane Purchased", summary: "Madras government bought a de Havilland Dove for official use.", source_name: "The Hindu", rank: 2 },
    { year: 1948, title: "Gandhi Assassination", summary: "Mahatma Gandhi's assassination led to widespread mourning and hartals.", source_name: "News Archives", rank: 3 },
    { year: 1948, title: "'Naam Iruvar' Film Released", summary: "Patriotic film known for Bharathiyar songs.", source_name: "Film Archives", rank: 4 },
  
    { year: 1949, title: "DMK Formed", summary: "Formed by C.N. Annadurai and others splitting from Dravidar Kazhagam.", source_name: "Political History", rank: 1 },

    { year: 1949, title: "Agitation for Greater Andhra", summary: "Demand for Telugu state with Madras as capital.", source_name: "Historical Archives", rank: 3 },
    { year: 1949, title: "'Velaikaari' Film", summary: "Screenplay by Annadurai promoting social reform.", source_name: "Film Archives", rank: 4 },
  
    { year: 1950, title: "Madras Presidency Renamed Madras State", summary: "Officially became Madras State on January 26.", source_name: "Constitution of India", rank: 1 },
    { year: 1950, title: "First Republic Day", summary: "P. S. Kumaraswamy Raja unfurled flag in celebrations.", source_name: "News Archives", rank: 2 },
    { year: 1950, title: "'Ezhai Padum Padu' Film", summary: "Social justice themed film based on Les Miserables.", source_name: "Film Archives", rank: 3 },
    { year: 1950, title: "Rise of Communist Movements", summary: "Communists gained influence especially in rural areas.", source_name: "Political History", rank: 4 },
  
    { year: 1951, title: "First General Elections", summary: "Election preparations commenced in Madras State.", source_name: "Election Archives", rank: 1 },
    { year: 1951, title: "First Five Year Plan", summary: "Focus on agriculture, irrigation, and key developmental projects.", source_name: "Planning Commission", rank: 2 },
    { year: 1951, title: "'Parasakthi' Production", summary: "Film with powerful dialogues, first Sivaji Ganesan role.", source_name: "Film Archives", rank: 3 },
    { year: 1951, title: "Mettur Dam Expansion", summary: "Expanded power and irrigation capacity.", source_name: "Government Reports", rank: 4 },

    { year: 1952, title: "Assembly Hung", summary: "No clear majority; Congress largest party.", source_name: "Election Archives", rank: 2 },
    { year: 1952, title: "C. Rajagopalachari CM", summary: "Appointed Chief Minister, controversial nomination.", source_name: "Political History", rank: 3 },
    { year: 1952, title: "'Parasakthi' Film Released", summary: "Controversial social film sparked protests.", source_name: "Film Archives", rank: 4 },

    { year: 1953, title: "Rajaji's Vocational Scheme", summary: "Kula Kalvi Thittam introduced causing uproar.", source_name: "Political Archives", rank: 2 },

    { year: 1954, title: "'Andha Naal' Film", summary: "First Tamil thriller without songs.", source_name: "Film Archives", rank: 2 },

    { year: 1954, title: "Library Expansion", summary: "Growth of Madras public library system.", source_name: "Library Archives", rank: 4 },
